utkarshhhhh._: Its an unpopular opinion but i think putting up such articles on the internet is of no use. Its True that we must create public awareness and consciousness amongst the uneducated sectors of the society who think when someone is sexually assaulted both parties are to be blamed. Rape is a very serious issue in our country and the increasing of it is only alarming, we must certainly take some initiative toward a better society but writing these articles on the internet is of no use because these mostly go unnoticed and it just fuels ones personal ego and one feels that they has done his part. What i believe is that it is better to have community meetings and educate people rather than writing these articles because these article tend to be abstract and have no affect on the general media. All we do by posting articles like this is blow things out of proportion for the victim because a rape victim would certainly not want publicity and would rather have the matter under covers. Its better if we keep this opinions to ourselves and really take action because to put it bluntly the writer of the article has just wasted their time and the only thing they have achieved is a few number of likes on a social platform and not really achieved what they have set out to achieve.
